name: Tap A Cup
description:
"Tap A Cup" (TAC) is the current working title for a physics-based mobile app all about embracing your rage on those pesky (yet eco-friendly) papercups you get pretty much everywhere you want to enjoy a sip of your favorite drink!

Note:
This is merely a prototype and will probably change later on, so I encourage you to give me tips for improving the overall game and experience! :D
